author: Giel Blankestijn
comment: This looks promising. Is development still ongoing? Would like to see tasker integration!
title: So far so good

author: Kyle Borreson
comment: Almost a year since the last update,  no tasker support as yet.
title: Dead project?

author: Ryan Tauriainen
comment: I can't wait for Wear integration!
title: Great App

author: Chris Lachance
comment: So much better than the stock

author: Marijn Bulten
comment: Unlike the original Harmony app from Logitech, this app is clean, fast and does exactly what it should do. I was expecting ads as the app is free, but no ads! Can't wait for Android Wear support, keep up the good work!
title: Best Harmony remote

author: Petr Krejci
comment: It will need some improvements, eg. some buttons missing, devices screen etc. Overall it is very promising. Can't wait for Tasker integration!
title: Great start
